segments.text: I went to Super Junior's concert last night . It was fantastic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Their songs are very popular all round Asia now . I am also a big fan of theirs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , their new album just came out last week . It is number one on the billboard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really love their dancing . They are all excellent dancers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The lyrics of the new song are beautiful , too . Can you sing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I think you can hear the song everywhere you go now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's go buy their new album . Want to come with me ?
segments.speaker: S1
